content:
Eu­(OAc)3·4H2O (0.15 mmol, 60.1 mg), 0.1 mmol of H3BTB (43.8 mg), and 0.4 mmol of LiOH·H2O (16.8 mg) in DMA (4 mL) and H2O (1 mL) were sealed in a 15 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave. The autoclave was heated at 130 °C for 3 days under autogenous pressure and then cooled to room temperature at 2 °C/h under ambient conditions. The colorless block crystals were obtained and washed with DMA. Yield: 83%, based on Eu­(OAc)3·4H2O. Anal. Calcd for compound 1: C 53.32, H 4.02, N 1.38. Found: C 53.47, H 4.18, N 1.32.

Preparation of {[H<sub>3</sub>O]<sub>2</sub>[Dy<sub>2.5</sub>(BTB)<sub>3</sub>(OAc)<sub>0.5</sub>(H<sub>2</sub>O)<sub>3</sub>]·2DMA·2.5H<sub>2</sub>O}<sub> <italic>n</italic> </sub> (<bold>2</bold>)

Compound 2 was obtained in a similar way to compound 1 except that Dy­(OAc)3·4H2O was used to replace Yb­(OAc)3·4H2O. Yield: 81%, based on Dy­(OAc)3·4H2O. Anal. Calcd for compound 2: C 52.63, H 3.97, N 1.36. Found: C 52.95, H 4.05, N 1.42.

Preparation of {[H<sub>3</sub>O]<sub>2</sub>[Yb<sub>2.5</sub>(BTB)<sub>3</sub>(OAc)<sub>0.5</sub>(H<sub>2</sub>O)<sub>3</sub>]·2DMA·2.5H<sub>2</sub>O}<sub> <italic>n</italic> </sub> (<bold>3</bold>)

Compound 3 was obtained in a similar way to compound 1 except that Yb­(OAc)3·4H2O was used to replace Yb­(OAc)3·4H2O. Yield: 81%, based on Yb­(OAc)3·4H2O. Anal. Calcd for compound 3: C 51.97, H 3.92, N 1.34. Found: C 51.87, H 4.07, N 1.38.
clean_text:
Experimental Section

Preparation of {[H3O]2[Eu2.5(BTB)3(OAc)0.5(H2O)3]⋅2DMA⋅2.5H2O} n  (1)

Eu(OAc)3⋅4H2O (0.15 mmol, 60.1 mg), 0.1 mmol of H3BTB (43.8 mg), and 0.4 mmol of LiOH⋅H2O (16.8 mg) in DMA (4 mL) and H2O (1 mL) were sealed in a 15 mL Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave. The autoclave was heated at 130 °C for 3 days under autogenous pressure and then cooled to room temperature at 2 °C/h under ambient conditions. The colorless block crystals were obtained and washed with DMA. Yield: 83%, based on Eu(OAc)3⋅4H2O. Anal. Calcd for compound 1: C 53.32, H 4.02, N 1.38. Found: C 53.47, H 4.18, N 1.32.

Preparation of {[H3O]2[Dy2.5(BTB)3(OAc)0.5(H2O)3]⋅2DMA⋅2.5H2O} n  (2)

Compound 2 was obtained in a similar way to compound 1 except that Dy(OAc)3⋅4H2O was used to replace Yb(OAc)3⋅4H2O. Yield: 81%, based on Dy(OAc)3⋅4H2O. Anal. Calcd for compound 2: C 52.63, H 3.97, N 1.36. Found: C 52.95, H 4.05, N 1.42.

Preparation of {[H3O]2[Yb2.5(BTB)3(OAc)0.5(H2O)3]⋅2DMA⋅2.5H2O} n  (3)

Compound 3 was obtained in a similar way to compound 1 except that Yb(OAc)3⋅4H2O was used to replace Yb(OAc)3⋅4H2O. Yield: 81%, based on Yb(OAc)3⋅4H2O. Anal. Calcd for compound 3: C 51.97, H 3.92, N 1.34. Found: C 51.87, H 4.07, N 1.38.
